title: Missing GAZEBO_MODEL_PATH causes std::string exception and crash

content.raw:
This line throws the exception:
```
(gdb) up
#5  gazebo::common::SystemPaths::UpdateModelPaths (this=0x80a88da90 <SingletonT<gazebo::common::SystemPaths>::GetInstance()::t>)
    at /usr/ports/misc/gazebo/work/osrf-gazebo-490bc3398435/gazebo/common/SystemPaths.cc:213
213	  this->InsertUnique(path.substr(pos1, path.size()-pos1), this->modelPaths);
```

```
(gdb) p pos1
$5 = 33
(gdb) p path.size()
$6 = 32
(gdb) p path.c_str()
$7 = (const std::__1::basic_string<char, std::__1::char_traits<char>, std::__1::allocator<char> >::value_type *) 0x829a2b190 "/usr/local/share/gazebo-9/models"
```

So the arithmetic there fails and causes the overflow and the negative size is supplied to the ```path.substr``` function.
